Many door businesses, as well as independent installation companies, will provide professionals that install sliding doors at the home for an additional cost. Typically, a single sliding door will take roughly four hours to install, and that will cost between $100 and $300 depending on the provider.

Sliding glass door prices. You may purchase a sliding glass door for $400 to $700. This will buy you the standard 5 foot to 6 foot sliding glass door. It will be made of an aluminum frame and glass windows. An 8 foot door of similar construction will cost $950 to $1,200. A nine foot door will cost $1,000 to $1,200.
